name: retoken-app

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client

server: nodemon server.js --exec babel-node --presets babel-preset-env -- prefix server
dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
start: cd server && npm install && node server.js
heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
